actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to allow a Member who has successfully offered an amendment in the House to a measure committed to conference committee to be afforded an opportunity to appear before the conference committee to make comments respecting the amendment.

summary.text: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to afford a Member an opportunity to appear before a conference committee to make comments respecting any amendment which such member has successfully offered in the House.

titles.title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to allow a Member who has successfully offered an amendment in the House to a measure committed to conference committee to be afforded an opportunity to appear before the conference committee to make comments respecting the amendment.
